value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Introduction to DAX Studio - By Darren Gosbell
value.excerpt: DAX Studio is the tool for data model tuning.  Darren Gosbell the creator of DAX Studio will be giving a live demo of his tool.    In this webinar we will be reviewing the following topics:  - What is DAX Studio?  - Why should I use DAX Studio?  - Getting started and connecting DAX Studio to various

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Using Scripts in Tabular Editor
value.excerpt: Tabular Editor is an incredible Tool that enables users to manipulate a Tabular Model at lighting speeds.  Daniel Otykier is the creator of Tabular Editor. value.excerpt: In the previous video, I explained how you can use GROUPBY function in DAX to create an aggregated table. value.title: Calculating Stock on Hand Using DAX   Power BI Inventory Model

value.title: Combining Tables in Power BI   Union Except and Intersect in DAX

value.title: Relative Date Slicer in Power BI   Simple yet Powerful

This is a very simple type of slicer to use, but very effective in terms of options that it provides for the user to slice and dice the data. Let’s check it out in this short video.

value.title: Removing the Total Value for a Column in the Table Visual of Power BI Using ISFILTERED
value.excerpt: Table visual is one of the most commonly used visuals. In Power BI, you can turn off the total row (when it won’t make sense to have the total) entirely. However, you cannot turn off the total for some columns and keep it working for the others. Using a DAX function, you can, however, do this easily.

value.title: Customize default values for each user in Power BI reports
value.excerpt: Learn how to use calculation groups to define a default set of values for columns in your model.
